data.text: Nuɓusɛiti pɛ ti maamusɛ, tɔ ɠa é ga GALA golai, maayikiai,
Ti è-zɛbɛi maamusɛ, masagi nii telebodai nɛai bɛ!
À ada-ƓALAGI, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-bɔɔlɔlai ɠula kɛlɛma,
Moize ta Aalɔn, ti ɠɛni ga ná-zalaɠa ɠula nuiti,
É yɛni tonaɓiingi zu, é ɓɔɛ ti ʋɔ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gá-ƓALAGI, ɗa ɠa è ti wooɠaaʋoteni,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-bɔɔlɔlai ɠula kɛlɛma, ada-ƓALAGI,
